title: Classes Cancelled At Seattle University After Shooting
teaser: Classes are canceled today at Seattle Pacific University after a shooting there yesterday left one person dead and two wounded.
contentencoded:
Classes are canceled today at Seattle Pacific University after a shooting there yesterday left one person dead and two wounded.

Police have taken 26-year old Aaron Ybarra into custody. They say he was not a student at the school.

Caroyln Adolph, a reporter at KUOW in Seattle — a Here & Now contributor station — was at the school shortly after the shootings and sent us this report.

Note: This report may make some people uncomfortable.

Reporter
